    Interface IJPYC

    interface IJPYC {
        allowance(
            owner: { owner: `0x${string}`; spender: `0x${string}` },
        ): Promise<number>;
        approve(
            spender: { spender: `0x${string}`; value: number },
        ): Promise<`0x${string}`>;
        balanceOf(account: { account: `0x${string}` }): Promise<number>;
        cancelAuthorization(
            authorizer: {
                authorizer: `0x${string}`;
                nonce: `0x${string}`;
                r: `0x${string}`;
                s: `0x${string}`;
                v: Uint8;
            },
        ): Promise<`0x${string}`>;
        configureMinter(
            minter: { minter: `0x${string}`; minterAllowedAmount: number },
        ): Promise<`0x${string}`>;
        decreaseAllowance(
            spender: { decrement: number; spender: `0x${string}` },
        ): Promise<`0x${string}`>;
        increaseAllowance(
            spender: { increment: number; spender: `0x${string}` },
        ): Promise<`0x${string}`>;
        isMinter(account: { account: `0x${string}` }): Promise<boolean>;
        mint(to: { amount: number; to: `0x${string}` }): Promise<`0x${string}`>;
        minterAllowance(minter: { minter: `0x${string}` }): Promise<number>;
        nonces(owner: { owner: `0x${string}` }): Promise<Uint256>;
        permit(
            owner: {
                deadline: Uint256;
                owner: `0x${string}`;
                r: `0x${string}`;
                s: `0x${string}`;
                spender: `0x${string}`;
                v: Uint8;
                value: number;
            },
        ): Promise<`0x${string}`>;
        receiveWithAuthorization(
            from: {
                from: `0x${string}`;
                nonce: `0x${string}`;
                r: `0x${string}`;
                s: `0x${string}`;
                to: `0x${string}`;
                v: Uint8;
                validAfter: Uint256;
                validBefore: Uint256;
                value: number;
            },
        ): Promise<`0x${string}`>;
        totalSupply(): Promise<number>;
        transfer(to: { to: `0x${string}`; value: number }): Promise<`0x${string}`>;
        transferFrom(
            from: { from: `0x${string}`; to: `0x${string}`; value: number },
        ): Promise<`0x${string}`>;
        transferWithAuthorization(
            from: {
                from: `0x${string}`;
                nonce: `0x${string}`;
                r: `0x${string}`;
                s: `0x${string}`;
                to: `0x${string}`;
                v: Uint8;
                validAfter: Uint256;
                validBefore: Uint256;
                value: number;
            },
        ): Promise<`0x${string}`>;
    }
